Header: Court grants Police request to detain two NTJ members for 90 days
Content: The judiciary permitted to detain for 90 days the two members of the Thawheed Jamath organization arrested for giving publicity for Islamist extremist views. The Colombo Chief Magistrateâ€™s Court granted this permission to the Kotahena Police. These two suspects were arrested according to information received by the Kotahena Intelligence sleuths. They were arrested with 12 CDs, a laptop, mobile phones and several electronic appliances. During interrogation, it was revealed that the suspects are residents of Kattankudy.
